        Constructor for creating a movie
        Parameters:
        description - Description of the movie
        title - Title of the movie
        releaseDate - Date of the movie's release
        genres - Category of genres ( can be horror, action etc)
        tags - ArrayList of tags that represent keywords for the movie
        director - Director of the movie
        id - Id of the movie which is used to uniquely identify the movie
        duration - Duration of the movie

        Parameters:
        description - Description of the movie
        title - Title of the movie
        releaseDate - Date of the movie's release
        genres - Category of genres ( can be horror, action etc)
        tags - ArrayList of tags that represent keywords for the movie
        director - Director of the movie
        id - Id of the movie which is used to uniquely identify the movie
        duration - Duration of the movie
        comments - The comments belonging to the item
